p: For this experiment, calli obtained in dark (2,4-D) and light (BA) conditions were transplanted to the control medium, without elicitors, and to two treatments containing the elicitors salicylic acid [ 13] and chitosan [ 14], all with 20 test tubes containing one callus (repetition) each; the medium used was the MS Â½ medium, plus 3% sucrose and 0.1 g/L inositol, supplemented with 2.0 mg/L BA. The pH was adjusted to 5.8 and the medium was solidified with 6.4 g/L agar.
